description: An executable item that is integrated in the application's navigation menu. Add a listener on *select* to implement the action.

placementPriority.description: Actions with higher placement priority will be placed at a more significant position in the UI, e.g. low priority actions could go into a menu instead of being included in a toolbar.

title.description: The text to be displayed for the action.

select.description: Fired when the action is invoked.
